disaster_relief|DisasterEvents|DistRegis: VARCHAR(20). Unique disaster event identifier. PK.
disaster_relief|DisasterEvents|TIMEMARK: TIMESTAMP. Timestamp when the disaster event was recorded. Example: 2024-12-21 19:49.
disaster_relief|DisasterEvents|HazType: HazType_enum. Type of the disaster (e.g., Wildfire, Earthquake). Possible values: Earthquake, Flood, Hurricane, Tsunami, Wildfire.
disaster_relief|DisasterEvents|haz_level: TEXT. Severity level of the disaster event. Possible values: Severity-1, Severity-2, Severity-3, Severity-4, Severity-5.
disaster_relief|DisasterEvents|affectedA: TEXT. Geographic area impacted by the disaster. Example: East Jeremy.
disaster_relief|DisasterEvents|REGION_TA: TEXT. Regional tag for categorization. Example: RC7250.
disaster_relief|DisasterEvents|latcoord: REAL. Latitude coordinate of the disaster center. Example: 51.203609.
disaster_relief|DisasterEvents|LON_COORD: REAL. Longitude coordinate of the disaster center. Example: 36.221141.
disaster_relief|DisasterEvents|damageRep: TEXT. Detailed report of the damage caused by the disaster. Possible values: Catastrophic, Minor, Moderate, Severe.
disaster_relief|DistributionHubs|HubRegi: VARCHAR(20). Unique distribution hub identifier. PK.
disaster_relief|DistributionHubs|HUB_CAP: REAL. Hub's capacity in tons. Example: 5101.
disaster_relief|DistributionHubs|store_c: REAL. Hub's storage capacity in cubic meters. Example: 93293.
disaster_relief|DistributionHubs|STOREAV: REAL. Available storage capacity in cubic meters. Example: 7279.
disaster_relief|DistributionHubs|coldSto: REAL. Cold storage capacity in cubic meters. Example: 249.
disaster_relief|DistributionHubs|COLD_ST: REAL. Cold storage temperature in Celsius. **NULL means cold storage temperature not recorded.**. Example: 6.6.
disaster_relief|DistributionHubs|warehou: TEXT. Warehouse operational state. Possible values: Excellent, Fair, Good, Poor.
disaster_relief|Operations|OpsRegistry: VARCHAR(20). Unique operation registry identifier. PK.
disaster_relief|Operations|emergLevel: EmergLevel_enum. Emergency level of the operation. Possible values: Black, Orange, Red, Yellow.
disaster_relief|Operations|RESP_PHASE: TEXT. Response phase during the operation. Possible values: Emergency, Initial, Reconstruction, Recovery.
disaster_relief|Operations|OpsStatus: TEXT. Operational status description. Possible values: Active, Completed, Planning, Scaling Down.
disaster_relief|Operations|COORDCENTER: TEXT. Coordination center for the operation. Example: CC7649.
disaster_relief|Operations|ops_start_dat: DATE. Date when the operation started. Example: 2025-01-26.
disaster_relief|Operations|ESTDURATIONDA: BIGINT. Estimated duration of the operation in days. Example: 12.
disaster_relief|Operations|Priority_rank: PriorityRank_enum. Priority rank of the operation. Possible values: Critical, High, Low, Medium.
disaster_relief|Operations|resourceAlloc: ResourceAllocState_enum. Resource allocation status. Possible values: Critical, Limited, Sufficient.
disaster_relief|Operations|SUPPLY_FLOW_S: TEXT. Supply flow status during the operation. Possible values: Disrupted, Stable, Strained.
disaster_relief|Supplies|SupplyRegistry: VARCHAR(20). Unique supply registry identifier. PK.
disaster_relief|Supplies|supply_dist_ref: VARCHAR(20). Disaster event reference. FK to DisasterEvents.
disaster_relief|Supplies|SUPPLYHUBREF: VARCHAR(20). Distribution hub reference. FK to DistributionHubs.
disaster_relief|Supplies|FoodTons: REAL. Amount of food supplies in tons. Example: 479.4.
disaster_relief|Supplies|water_liters: REAL. Amount of water supplies in liters. Example: 283596.
disaster_relief|Supplies|MEDUNITS: BIGINT. Number of medical units. Example: 15593.0.
disaster_relief|Supplies|shelter_units: BIGINT. Number of shelter units. Example: 7534.
disaster_relief|Supplies|HYGIENE_UNITS: BIGINT. Number of hygiene units. Example: 46981.
disaster_relief|Supplies|powergenunits: BIGINT. Number of power generators. Example: 568.
disaster_relief|Supplies|FUEL_RESERVE_LI: REAL. Amount of fuel reserves in liters. Example: 86011.
disaster_relief|Transportation|Transport: VARCHAR(20). Unique transportation registry identifier. PK.
disaster_relief|Transportation|transport: VARCHAR(20). Disaster event reference. FK to DisasterEvents.
disaster_relief|Transportation|TRANSPORT: VARCHAR(20). Distribution hub reference. FK to DistributionHubs.
disaster_relief|Transportation|transport: VARCHAR(20). Supply reference. FK to Supplies.
disaster_relief|Transportation|VEHICLECO: BIGINT. Number of vehicles available. **NULL means vehicle count not recorded.**. Example: 141.0.
disaster_relief|Transportation|trucks_av: BIGINT. Number of available trucks. Example: 88.
disaster_relief|Transportation|HelosAvai: BIGINT. Number of available helicopters. Example: 7.
disaster_relief|Transportation|BOATSAVAI: BIGINT. Number of available boats. Example: 7.
disaster_relief|Transportation|lastmileS: TEXT. Status of the last-mile delivery. Possible values: Delayed, On Track, Suspended.
disaster_relief|Transportation|distribut: BIGINT. Number of distribution points. Example: 35.
disaster_relief|HumanResources|HRRegistr: VARCHAR(20). Unique human resources registry identifier. PK.
disaster_relief|HumanResources|hrdistref: VARCHAR(20). Disaster event reference. FK to DisasterEvents.
disaster_relief|HumanResources|HR_Ops_Re: VARCHAR(20). Operations reference. FK to Operations.
disaster_relief|Financials|FinanceRegist: VARCHAR(20). Unique financials registry identifier. PK.
disaster_relief|Financials|finDistRef: VARCHAR(20). Disaster event reference. FK to DisasterEvents.
disaster_relief|Financials|FIN_OPS_REF: VARCHAR(20). Operations reference. FK to Operations.
disaster_relief|Financials|BUDGETALLOTUS: TEXT. Allotted budget in USD. Example: $4,227,090.00.
disaster_relief|Financials|funds_util_pc: TEXT. Percentage of funds utilized. Example: 9.8%.
disaster_relief|Financials|costBeneUSD: TEXT. Cost-benefit ratio in USD. Example: $844.12.
disaster_relief|Financials|OPS_COSTS_USD: REAL. Operational costs in USD. Example: 88256.
disaster_relief|Financials|transportcost: BIGINT. Transportation costs in USD. Example: 976202.
disaster_relief|Financials|STORAGE_COSTS: REAL. Storage costs in USD. Example: 111548.
disaster_relief|Financials|personnelcost: REAL. Personnel costs in USD. Example: 364821.
disaster_relief|Financials|funding_state: TEXT. Funding state. Possible values: Adequate, Critical, Limited.
disaster_relief|Financials|DONOR_COMMITM: REAL. Donor commitments in USD. **NULL means no donor commitments.**. Example: 4068978.0.
disaster_relief|Financials|resource_gaps: BIGINT. Resource gaps in USD. Example: 95367.
disaster_relief|BeneficiariesAndAssessme: VARCHAR(20). Unique beneficiary registry identifier. PK.
VARCHAR(20). Disaster event reference. FK to DisasterEvents.
VARCHAR(20). Operations reference. FK to Operations.
BeneRegister_enum. Beneficiary registration status. **NULL means registration not completed.**. Possible values: Complete, Partial, Pending.
VulnerabilityReview_enum. Vulnerability review status. Possible values: Complete, In Progress, Pending.
TEXT. Status of needs assessment. Possible values: Due, Overdue, Updated.
REAL. Beneficiary feedback score. **NULL means feedback not recorded.**. Example: 1.3.
TEXT. Community engagement level. Possible values: High, Low, Medium.
TEXT. Local capacity growth description. **NULL means no growth recorded.**. Possible values: Active, Limited.
disaster_relief|EnvironmentAndHealth|Env: VARCHAR(20). Unique environment and health registry identifier. PK.
disaster_relief|EnvironmentAndHealth|env: VARCHAR(20). Disaster event reference. FK to DisasterEvents.
disaster_relief|CoordinationAndEvaluatio: VARCHAR(20). Unique coordination and evaluation registry identifier. PK.
VARCHAR(20). Disaster event reference. FK to DisasterEvents.
VARCHAR(20). Operations reference. FK to Operations.
BIGINT. Security incident count. Example: 83.
SafetyRanking_enum. Safety ranking level. **NULL means safety ranking not assessed.**. Possible values: High Risk, Moderate, Safe.
TEXT. Access limitation description. **NULL means no access limitations.**. Possible values: Partial, Severe.
CoordEffectLvl_enum. Coordination effect level. Possible values: High, Low, Medium.
TEXT. Partner organizations involved. Example: 9.0.
InfoSharingState_enum. Information-sharing effectiveness. Possible values: Effective, Limited, Poor.
REAL. Report compliance percentage. Example: 91.0.
BIGINT. Data quality score. Example: 3.8.
TEXT. Monitoring frequency description. Possible values: Daily, Monthly, Weekly.
EvaluationStage_enum. Evaluation stage status. **NULL means evaluation stage not set.**. Possible values: Current, Due, Overdue.
LessonsLearnedStage_enum. Lessons learned stage. Possible values: Documented, In Progress, Pending.
ContingencyPlanStage_enum. Contingency plan stage. Possible values: Due, Overdue, Updated.
RiskMitigationSteps_enum. Risk mitigation steps status. Possible values: Adequate, Insufficient, Partial.
TEXT. Insurance coverage scope. Possible values: Full, Partial.
ComplianceState_enum. Compliance status. Possible values: Compliant, Non-Compliant, Partial.
AuditState_enum. Audit state. Possible values: Completed, Due, Overdue.
QualityControlSteps_enum. Quality control steps evaluation. Possible values: Moderate, Strong, Weak.
REAL. Stakeholder satisfaction score. Example: 4.0.
MediaCoverSentiment_enum. Media coverage sentiment. Possible values: Negative, Neutral, Positive.
TEXT. Public perception of the response. Example: 3.5★.
TEXT. Documentation state of the coordination efforts. Possible values: Complete, Incomplete, Partial.
TEXT. Status of lessons learned recording. Example: 5.
TEXT. Best practices listing status. Example: 2.
TEXT. Improvement recommendations. Example: 25.
DATE. Next scheduled review date. Example: 2025-04-22.
TEXT. Additional notes. **NULL means no notes recorded.**. Possible values: Delayed due to weather, Delivered without incident, Handle with care, Priority shipment, Rerouted to alternate hub.
disaster_relief|Operation_Hub_Map|OpsReg: VARCHAR(20). Operations registry identifier. PK. FK to Operations.
disaster_relief|Operation_Hub_Map|HubReg: VARCHAR(20). Distribution hub registry identifier. PK. FK to DistributionHubs.
disaster_relief|Operation_Hub_Map|hub_ro: TEXT. Role or function of the hub in the operation. Possible values: Backup Hub, Forward Depot, Primary Hub.
disaster_relief|Operation_Hub_Map|ALLOCA: REAL. Allocated capacity in tons. Example: 202.6.

disaster_relief|DisasterEvents|impact_su.column_meaning: JSONB column. Summarizes the impact of the disaster including population effects and damage levels.

population_impact.affected: BIGINT. Number of affected population. Example: 228943.
population_impact.displaced: BIGINT. Number of displaced individuals. **NULL means displacement data not available.**. Example: 31578.0.
population_impact.casualties: BIGINT. Number of casualties due to the disaster. Example: 174.
population_impact.injured: BIGINT. Number of injuries caused by the disaster. **NULL means injury data not available.**. Example: 4524.0.
population_impact.missing: BIGINT. Number of missing persons. **NULL means missing persons data not recorded.**. Example: 212.0.

infrastructure_damage.infra_damage_pct: REAL. Percentage of infrastructure damaged. Example: 19.0.
infrastructure_damage.power_outage_pct: REAL. Percentage of power outages. **NULL means power outage data not recorded.**. Example: 93.2.
infrastructure_damage.water_damage_pct: BIGINT. Percentage of water infrastructure damage. **NULL means water damage data not available.**. Example: 77.4.

communication_and_transport.communication_state: TEXT. Communication network status during the disaster. Possible values: Down, Limited, OP.
communication_and_transport.transport_access: TEXT. Access to transportation routes during the disaster. Possible values: Full, Limited, Minimal.

disaster_relief|HumanResources|staffing_.column_meaning: JSONB column. Details about staffing levels and composition across different roles.

staff_counts.total: BIGINT. Total number of staff. **NULL means staff count not recorded.**. Example: 234.0.
staff_counts.medical: BIGINT. Number of medical staff. Example: 52.
staff_counts.logistics: BIGINT. Number of logistics staff. Example: 99.
staff_counts.security: BIGINT. Number of security staff. **NULL means security staff not recorded.**. Example: 46.0.
staff_counts.volunteers: BIGINT. Total number of volunteers. Example: 435.0.

availability_and_equipment.training_state: TEXT. Training state of staff. **NULL means training state not recorded.**. Possible values: Complete, In Progress, Required.
availability_and_equipment.ppe_status: TEXT. Personal protective equipment status. Possible values: Critical, LTD, ✓.
availability_and_equipment.comm_equipment: TEXT. Communication equipment status. Possible values: Insufficient, Limited, Sufficient.

disaster_relief|Transportation|delivery_.column_meaning: JSONB column. Captures delivery statistics including capacity, performance, and vehicle metrics.

delivery_performance.avg_hours: REAL. Average delivery hours. **NULL means delivery time not recorded.**. Example: 20.7.
delivery_performance.success_rate: REAL. Delivery success rate percentage. Example: 79.4.
delivery_performance.route_optimization_status: RouteOptStatus_enum. Route optimization status. Possible values: In Progress, Optimized, Required.

vehicle_metrics.fuel_efficiency_lpk: REAL. Fuel efficiency in liters per kilometer. Example: 10.6.
vehicle_metrics.maintenance_state: TEXT. Vehicle maintenance state. Possible values: Due, Overdue, Up to Date.

disaster_relief|EnvironmentAndHealth|hea.column_meaning: JSONB column. Summarizes environmental and health conditions during the disaster response.

environment.impact_rate: TEXT. Environmental impact rate. Possible values: High, Low, Medium.
environment.waste_management: TEXT. Waste management status. Possible values: Adequate, Critical, Limited.
environment.carbon_tons: REAL. Carbon emissions in tons. **NULL means carbon data not recorded.**. Example: 793.5.
environment.water_quality_index: TEXT. Water quality index. Example: 85.6 WQI.

health.disease_risk: DiseaseRisk_enum. Disease risk level. Possible values: High, Low, Medium.
health.medical_capacity: MedicalEmergencyCapacity_enum. Medical emergency capacity level. Possible values: Adequate, Critical, Limited.
health.vaccination_coverage: REAL. Vaccination coverage percentage. **NULL means vaccination coverage not recorded.**. Example: 14.8.
health.mental_health_aid: TEXT. Mental health aid status. Possible values: Available, Limited.
